Posts.EditableText:
Do you wonderful people at textadventure.co.uk have any plans to update Squiffy for OS X with options to [compare attributes](http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/squiffy/attributes.html) etc?

Also, have you considered putting in some kind of {random:alpha:beta:delta} function like Quest has? Random attributes are pretty fun to use, and they're not easy for non-coders.
Posts.HTML:
